mapper.select: select nvl(max(OPENUSE_NUM),0) from OPENBANK_USE where OPEN_ACCOUNT=#{open_account}
select OPENUSE_DATE from OPENBANK_USE where OPEN_ACCOUNT = #{open_account} and OPENUSE_NUM = #{openuse_num}
select OPENUSE_NUM, OPENUSE_DATE, OPENUSE_ASSORT, OPENUSE_OUTMONEY, OPENUSE_INMONEY, OPENUSE_CONTENT, OPENUSE_BALANCE from OPENBANK_USE where OPEN_ACCOUNT = #{selectedAccount} order by OPENUSE_NUM

select OPENUSE_NUM, OPENUSE_DATE, OPENUSE_ASSORT, OPENUSE_OUTMONEY, OPENUSE_INMONEY, OPENUSE_CONTENT, OPENUSE_BALANCE from OPENBANK_USE where OPEN_ACCOUNT = #{selectedAccount} and OPENUSE_DATE between TO_DATE(#{start_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(#{end_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order by OPENUSE_NUM

select OPENUSE_NUM, OPENUSE_DATE, OPENUSE_ASSORT, OPENUSE_OUTMONEY, OPENUSE_INMONEY, OPENUSE_CONTENT, OPENUSE_BALANCE from OPENBANK_USE where OPEN_ACCOUNT = #{selectedAccount} and OPENUSE_CONTENT = #{content} order by OPENUSE_NUM

select OPENUSE_NUM, OPENUSE_DATE, OPENUSE_ASSORT, OPENUSE_OUTMONEY, OPENUSE_INMONEY, OPENUSE_CONTENT, OPENUSE_BALANCE from OPENBANK_USE where OPEN_ACCOUNT = #{selectedAccount} and OPENUSE_CONTENT = #{content} and OPENUSE_DATE between TO_DATE(#{start_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(#{end_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order by OPENUSE_NUM

select NVL(SUM(OPENUSE_OUTMONEY),0) AS OUTMONEY, NVL(SUM(OPENUSE_INMONEY),0) AS INMONEY from OPENBANK_USE where OPEN_ACCOUNT = #{selectedAccount} and OPENUSE_CONTENT = #{content} and OPENUSE_DATE between TO_DATE(#{start_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(#{end_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order by OPENUSE_NUM
mapper.insert: insert into OPENBANK_USE (OPEN_ACCOUNT, OPENUSE_NUM, OPENUSE_DATE, OPENUSE_ASSORT, OPENUSE_OUTMONEY, OPENUSE_INMONEY, OPENUSE_CONTENT, OPENUSE_BALANCE) values (#{open_account}, #{openuse_num}, TO_DATE(#{openuse_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),#{openuse_assort}, #{openuse_outmoney},#{openuse_inmoney},#{openuse_content},#{openuse_balance})
mapper.update: update OPENBANK set OPEN_BALANCE=#{open_balance} where OPEN_ACCOUNT = #{open_account}

update OPENBANK_USE set OPENUSE_DATE=TO_DATE(#{openuse_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), OPENUSE_ASSORT=#{openuse_assort}, OPENUSE_OUTMONEY=#{openuse_outmoney}, OPENUSE_INMONEY=#{openuse_inmoney}, OPENUSE_CONTENT=#{openuse_content}, OPENUSE_BALANCE=#{openuse_balance} where OPENUSE_NUM = #{openuse_num}
